short: a {ypolished{x wooden sceptre carved with {yMarkov's{X symbol
long: A piece of highly polished wood rests here.
A steel pendant crackles and sparks.
A pile of very fine brown silk has been dropped here.
A brilliant mithril badge bears the device of Markov.
A fine mining pick glints with the quality of mithril.
A battleaxe glows with inner heat, scorching the ground.

short: a {Dblack{x silk dress finely embroidered with {dpurple{x thread
long: A pile of very fine black silk is here.
A bright cotton robe has been embroidered in the symbols of {MMahrina{x.
A crisp velvet robe has been painted in the colors of the storm.
A steel single-bladed war axe looks to be of dwarven design.
A leather belt has bright purple and white beads stitched to it.
A perfectly spherical emerald rests gently here.
A piece of obsidian glints with power.
A golden orb shines with power.
With intricate silver decorations, this breastplate looks quite valuable.
A silver bracer has been delicately engraved with runes of lightning.
A silver bracelet sparkles in the light.
A thick steel helmet looks quite heavy.
A pair of black canvas trousers sprawls here.
A pair of gloves would blend in well with sand.
A black-runed sword lies flat on the ground.
A sandy tan shirt rests on the ground.
A glinting, silvery battleaxe has been dropped here.
A thick strip of black leather has bone studs protruding from it.
Looking delicate but strong, a pile of mithril chain rests here.
A hammer of the finest mithril glints attractively.
The dagger resting here appears to be poisoned.
A pile of tan wool has a bit of sand on it.
Looking like sand, a robe has been left in a pile.
This butcher's knife looks sharp and dangerous.
A bright yellow felt hat has been discarded.
A worn strip of leather has been dropped here.
A long leather whip lies coiled upon the ground.
Well-tailored black robes lie here on the ground.
The black leggings resting here look very small.
A short, curved sword is quite peculiar.
A huge head piece has been made of raven's feathers.
A fine lace veil rests gently upon the ground.
A wide, short tunic has been dropped.
A mound of dark satin rests here.
A small pile of sand lies here.
An iron pike lies on the ground, slightly dusty.
Soft leather pants have been cut off mid-calf.
A pair of light grey leggings sprawls here.
A small steel axe has been left on the ground.
A ragged pair of red cotton leggings lies here.
This pair of steel leg greaves has been painted black.
These hard-looking leather boots have been reinforced with steel.
A long staff of the hardest wood possible rests here.
A pair of heavy canvas breeches is in a pile here.
This pair of boots appears to have been dipped in alcohol.
A pile of sand appears to have gathered here.
A very small silver dagger has been left here.
A shiny breastplate of iron-hard wood has been dropped here.
A satin wrist-protector rests awkwardly on the ground.
A strip of leather has been tooled with a mountain scene.
Looking lonely, a heavy hammer lies here.
A long wooden spear has a very sharp point.
This belt has been made of braided cotton.
An iron spear has a slight layer of dust coating it.
A belt with strange white patterns running through the leather rests here.
A pair of dark steel chain leggings lies in a heap.
A wooden spear appears to have a very sharp tip.
A seaweed headwrap seems to wilt a bit more every second.
A length of black hemp rope rests here.
A heavy practice blade has been discarded here.
A robe of plain, homespun cotton has been left here.
A long javelin has nasty poisoned barbs along the shaft.
A cape made of woven seaweed wilts here.
A battered felt hat has been poorly taken care of.
A dark gold dress sparkles here.
Two dusty leather sleeves lie atop each other.
A dagger with strange whitish swirls through the steel rests here.
A pile of brown wool is getting dirty.
A black leather vest has been dropped carelessly.
A whip painted totally white rests upon the ground.

short: a pair of {Ylightning-runed{x steel arm guards
long: A pair of steel arm guards glows with the power of {Ylightning{x.
A magically hardened wooden wristlet offers protection from wounds.
A pile of black cotton attracts dust.
A wooden trident gleams with inner magic.
These leather boots have very long tops.
A brown cotton tunic has been abandoned.
A very heavy wooden pick hums softly to itself.
A collection of small blue scented flowers rests here.
A cloak appears to have been made of woven strands of wind.
A pair of leather boots with fancy stitching rests here.
A strong steel breastplate has been left here to rust.
A pair of long seaweed trousers sprawls heres.
A single piece of wood has been carved into interlocking chains.
A staff of super-polished wood rests here, unattended.
An ice-coated flail sparkles prettily.
A pair of long chain sleeves rusts on the ground.
A standard issue steel pike has been discarded here.
A robe made out of cyan-dyed wool is in a pile.
A small axe has lightning running along its length.
A cone of woven seaweed has been left here.
A pair of seaweed sleeves withers slightly.
A belt of woven seaweed withers slightly.
A pile of bright yellow wool rests here.
A symbol made from bright beads glows with inner power.
A head wrap of rough wool lies here.
A jerkin has been made from woven strands of seaweed.

short: a {Ddusty{x suit of iron chain links
long: A pile of iron chainmail takes up space.
A pretty blue dress lies upon the ground.
Two boots dyed bright yellow lean against each other.
A broad-headed steel pike slowly rusts.
A pair of soft leather boots has been embroidered with angry stormclouds.
A beautiful necklace made of polished precious stones rests here.
A long, heavy broom has been made from the bristles of sea urchins.
These leggings have steel studs sticking out of them to deflect weapon strokes.
A pair of high-quality black sandals lies here.
A slim, light dagger made of steel is sitting here.
A yellow-dyed strip of leather rests here.
This pair of leather gloves has been spiked with bits of steel.
A pair of poorly made chain rests here.
Two seaweed boots lean against each other.
A small yellow tunic rests flat here.
A pair of very soft leather boots lies here.

short: a pair of shoddy dwarven chain sleeves
long: A battered pair of chain sleeves rests here.
A dress made of carefully woven strands of seaweed is in a pile.
A pixie-sized white tunic flutters here.
A basket has been made from woven braids of dried seaweed.
Strips of seaweed have been fashioned into comfortable boots.
A carved, iron-hard wooden collar lies here.

A black rose with a delicate tint of red around the edges rests mournfully.
A small wicker handbasket has been dropped here.
A pair of leather boots has been heavily reinforced with mithril plates.
A cloth doll has been dropped and left behind.
A bunch of red-painted clay beads are joined by a string.
A polished ring of pretty pink coral could almost cover an entire finger.
A carved wooden coin lies here, unimportant.
The golden dagger lying here looks nice, but not very functional.
A length of swirled pink coral rests here, charged with energy.
A dull grey wand has been fashioned out of some type of leather.
A wooden wand gleams with polish.
A wand made of hardened, twisted seaweed rests here.
The yellow paste dropped here almost glows with intense color.

A brilliant white liquid sloshes inside a vial.
